recipesJson.name: ADV Saratoga Clone
recipesJson.author: Bern
recipesJson.description: Credit to /u/waffles09 over at /r/DiY_eJuice for the idea. It's pretty damn close to Adirondack Vapor's Saratoga. I may lower the overall flavor amounts but otherwise it's really yummy. Good after 7-14 days but really shines if you can let it steep for 21 days.

reviews.text: This is the first strawberry recipe that's taken my attention away from God Milk.  This is damned fine.
